name: Origami Soul
description:
ORIGAMI SOUL

You are a soul crafted to fight the death that has corrupted your world.

Find and restore the four great trees to purify your world and defeat death!

HOW TO PLAY
  • Move with WASD or arrow keys or left stick on controller
  • Restore life to the ground just by moving over top of it.
  • Restore enough ground tiles around tree trunks in order to bring them back to life
  • See in-game hints with ESC/PAUSE/SPACE/TAB buttons
  • Play the Windows Standalone version for better performance and visuals!
CREDITS

All art and code done by me (for good or ill)!

All audio assets are free to use:

  • Various sfx from kenney.nl and freesound.com
  • Music from Kevin Macleod (incompetech.com)
